meanings.definition: Capable of being taught or trained.
meanings.sent1: She is very coachable and learns quickly in class.
meanings.sent2: The puppy was very coachable and learned to sit after just a few tries.
meanings.sent3: The coachable student eagerly absorbed all the new information.
meanings.sent4: Her coachable nature made her a standout in the training program.
meanings.sent5: The coachable athlete's progress was remarkable.

meanings.definition: Willing to receive instruction or guidance.
meanings.sent1: He is a coachable player who always listens to his coach's advice.
meanings.sent2: The team captain is very coachable and leads by example.
meanings.sent3: The coachable student welcomed feedback with open arms.
meanings.sent4: Her coachable attitude shone through during the team meeting.
meanings.sent5: The coachable employee excelled in the new project.
